gpt_comment: ⚠️[DIVERGENT] Meteoblue reports different weather conditions than the baseline. Meteoblue predicts 0.1-0.2" of rain, while the baseline suggests a 68% chance of rain. It's like comparing a sprinting gazelle (baseline) to a resting bumblebee (Meteoblue) in terms of activity.
